channel.description: Recent content in Distributed on Tarun Vellishetty

item.title: How Cryptocurrency works
item.description: Cryptocurrency is a distributed list of transactions. This list of transactions function as a digital/virtual currency.

item.title: Understanding BitTorrent Protocol
item.description: Simply put, the BitTorrent protocol is a P2P file sharing protocol.
